Pre-Game Insights: Ireland head coach Heimir Hallgrímsson is desperate to nail down a regular starting-11 as he continues on his journey as Ireland manager.
Hallgrímsson has picked 18 different players in his three starting-11s to date and admits he would like to achieve a more settled side.
Hallgrímsson is concerned about Greece's strong start in their previous encounter and aims to improve Ireland's start in the upcoming match.
Hallgrímsson wants to make Ireland a team that other nations hate to play against and is looking for players with strong character and resilience.
